content: k6 w+tk row 11-15 work five row stocking stitch short row 4 p5 w+tp row 16 decrease p3 p2tog p1 p3tog p1 p2tog p3 to end - 11sts short row 5 k4 w+tk row 17-18 work two row stocking stitch short row 6 p3 w+tp row 19 knit short row 7 k9 sts to end now work knit on the next row to create a garter stitch ridge just row 11-15 beginning with a purl row work five row stocking stitch before the foot sole as follows row 16 decrease k3 k2tog k1 k3tog k1 k2tog k3 to end - 11sts row 20 ws increase k2 kfb three times k2 - 14sts row 17-18 beginning with a purl row work two row stocking stitch cut yarn a join yarn b continue to work foot sole as follows baby rhino page 28 baby rhino page 29 now work knit on the next row to create a garter stitch ridge just hind legs- these are knitted separately and then joined onto the body left before the foot sole as follows hind leg row 19 ws knit with yarn a cast on 10 sts row 20 rs increase k2 kfb three times k2 - 14sts row 1-8 work eight row stocking stitch for left thigh row cut yarn a join yarn b continue to work foot sole as follows row 9 increase cast on 10 sts for left hind leg back k20 - 20sts row 21 ws decrease p2tog purl to last 2 sts p2tog - 12sts row 10-17 beginning with a purl row work eight row stocking stitch row 22 decrease k1 k2tog four times - 8sts row 18 decrease p6 p2tog p1 p2tog p1 p2tog p6 to end - 17sts row 23 purl row 19 decrease k7 k3tog k7 to end - 15sts row 24 decrease k2tog four times - 4sts row 20 purl cut yarn thread end through all 4 right foot sole sts pull up tight to row 21 knit gather the sts secure the end now work knit on the next row to create a garter stitch ridge just before the foot sole as follows join seam row 22 ws increase k5 kfb five times k5 to end - 20sts ws together fold the leg so that row ends meet use the yarn end to cut yarn a join yarn b continue to work foot sole as follows work mattress stitch along row ends up to foreleg back cast-on edge row 23 rs knit leaving the shoulder row unsewn for now row 24 decrease p3 p2tog four times - 16sts stuff the leg and foot lightly with yarn endings and a little toy filling row 25 & 27 knit flatten the foot - the garter stitch ridge determines the start of the row 26 decrease p2 p2tog four times - 12sts bottom of the foot row 28 decrease p1 p2tog four times - 8sts note you may wish to add a stitch or two into the centre of
